alert.note: Alert for Meade; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 9:28PM MDT until June 23 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ZIEBACH AND EASTERN MEADE COUNTIES... At 928 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Red Scaffold, or 12 miles southeast of Faith, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Red Scaffold and Intersection of Cherry Creek and Sunnybrook Roads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for west central South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
